<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/habits/{habitId}/contributions"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Contribution calendar для привычки

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"habitId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"days","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer","default":365,"minimum":1,"maximum":730},"description":"На сколько дней назад отдавать данные."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Массив дней активности.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Данные для GitHub-style contribution calendar.","required":["date","count","level","completed"],"properties":{"date":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"Дата.","example":"2025-11-01"},"count":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"description":"Количество выполнений в этот день.","example":1},"level":{"type":"integer","description":"Уровень интенсивности выполнения (0–4).","enum":[0,1,2,3,4],"example":2,"title":"IntensityLevel"},"completed":{"type":"boolean","description":"Была ли привычка выполнена в этот день.","example":true}},"title":"ContributionDay"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
